def second_minimum(number):
  i = 0
  if number > 0:
          print 0
  else:
          while number > 0:
            i = i + num
            num = num + 1
            print i          

print(second_minimum([70, 50, 20, 23, 40]))
print(second_minimum([70, 50, 10, 2, 40]))
